Description.Text:
Position Hotel Villa dei Fiori is located in Viserbella of Rimini, at about 50 meters from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last Refurbishment: some rooms in 2011.
Breakfast: sweet and salty buffet. During meals choice between 3 menus, salad buffet, dessert or fruit.
Credit cards accepted: Eurocard / Mastercard and Visa.
The swimmingpool is open from 08/06/2013 to 07/09/2013 (from 08:00 am to 12:30 midday and from 03:00 pm to 06:30 pm).
Check in at 10:00. Check out 09:00.
